name: and the stone dreamed light (Moebius tribute)
description:
3200 x 4000 px 

At first, the Great Spirit slept in nothingness.
His lethargy lasted from eternity.
And then suddenly, no one knows why, at night he had a dream.
An immense desire grew in Him...
-And I dreamed of The Light.
It was the first dream, the first of all roads.
For a long time The Light sought its realization, its ecstasy.
When he found it by din, he saw that it was transparency.
And transparency reigned.
But suddenly, having explored all the color games
What could I imagine, transparency was filled with the desire for something more...
He also had a dream.
She, so light, dreamed of being heavy.
Then the stone appeared!
It was the second dream, the second way.
For a long time, the stone sought its ecstasy, its realization.
When he finally found it, he saw that it was the crystal.
And the crystal reigned.
But in turn, having explored all the luminous games of
His glass needles, the glass was invaded by a new desire,
Something that surpassed him. And in turn he dreamed...
He, who was so solemn, so upright, so hard, dreamed of
Tenderness, flexibility and delicacy...
-Then the flower appeared.
